original_text: When the priests enter the Holy Place, they shall not go out of it into the outer court without laying there the garments in which they minister, for these are holy. They shall put on other garments before they go near to that which is for the people.”
korean_text: 제사장의 의복은 거룩하므로 제사장이 성소에 들어갔다가 나올 때에 바로 바깥뜰로 가지 못하고 수종드는 그 의복을 그 방에 두고 다른 옷을 입고 백성의 뜰로 나갈 것이니라 하더라

sentences.original_text: When the priests enter the Holy Place,
they shall not go out of it into the outer court
without laying there the garments in which they minister,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 그들이 섬기는 옷을 벗어두지 않고는,

sentences.original_text: They shall put on other garments
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 옷을 입어야 할 것이며,

sentences.original_text: before they go near to that which is for the people.”
sentences.korean_translation: 백성을 위한 곳에 가까이 가기 전에야.
